# Delete test courses (safe - only deletes auto-generated ones)
python manage.py delete_test_courses --test-only

# Delete courses from specific faculty
python manage.py delete_test_courses --faculty IT

# Delete courses with codes starting with "CS"
python manage.py delete_test_courses --code-pattern CS

# See what would be deleted without actually deleting
python manage.py delete_test_courses --test-only --dry-run

# Delete all courses (DANGEROUS!)
python manage.py delete_test_courses --all --force
